snippet.title: Heartbeats - A Graphic Puzzle
snippet.description:
First three levels for FREE here: https://itunes.apple.com/app/heartbeats-a-graphic-puzzle/id943364674?l=da&mt=8

JUST LAUNCHED TODAY!!!!

"When no one was watching, he would indulge in puzzles so challenging and unforgiving that they would make him forget the world outside - and the war that consumed the galaxy.

And so, all he left behind for the universe to remember him by was a series of puzzles that portrayed the events that had moved and made him. This game was his story and his legacy.

He called it Heartbeats."

If you thrive with the frustration of an old school puzzle, that brings you to the tear filled brink of rage quitting, then Heartbeats is your game.

You'll play through the intergalactic story of an old man looking back at his life during his final heartbeats.

The game is a graphic puzzle - a digital mix between a graphic novel and a puzzle game, where you unlock the pages one puzzle at a time.

Heartbeats contains ten pages/puzzles, the first 3 levels are free and then you pay 0,99 USD for the remaining 7.

It's short, sinister and heartcore.

Heartbeats is brought to you by Kong Orange

More:
https://www.facebook.com/TheKongOrange
https://twitter.com/TheKongOrange
